title: 2-Year-Old Boy Buried For 14 Hours After Strikes In Lebanon, Survives
content: Rescuers did not expect to find two-year-old Ali Khalifeh alive after an Israeli strike on southern Lebanon killed his entire family and left him trapped under the rubble for 14 hours.
summary: Rescuers did not expect to find two-year-old Ali Khalifeh alive after an Israeli strike on southern Lebanon killed his entire family and left him trapped under the rubble for 14 hours.

title: US Election 2024: Trump Secures 301 Electoral Votes, Harris At 226
content: The final state calls are coming in for the US presidential election, with President-elect Donald Trump at 301 electoral votes, well past the 270 needed for victory, and Democratic Vice President Kamala Harris at 226, US networks said.
summary: The final state calls are coming in for the US presidential election, with President-elect Donald Trump at 301 electoral votes, well past the 270 needed for victory, and Democratic Vice President Kamala Harris at 226, US networks said.

title: Trump's Immigration Curbs To Impact Millions Of Indians, Their Children
content: Donald Trump and JD Vance's campaign promise has become a cause of major concern for immigrants, especially Indian-Americans, as it brings uncertainty about their children becoming naturalised US citizens.
summary: Donald Trump and JD Vance's campaign promise has become a cause of major concern for immigrants, especially Indian-Americans, as it brings uncertainty about their children becoming naturalised US citizens.

title: Solar Flare Disrupts Radio Signals And Poses Global Infrastructure Risks
content: A powerful X-class solar flare erupted, causing shortwave radio blackouts over the Atlantic, South America, and Africa.
summary: A powerful X-class solar flare erupted, causing shortwave radio blackouts over the Atlantic, South America, and Africa.

title: Opinion: Once Again, A Trump-Sized Fear For COP
content: The re-election of Trump, who has previously dismissed climate change as a hoax, is unlikely to be good news for COP.
summary: The re-election of Trump, who has previously dismissed climate change as a hoax, is unlikely to be good news for COP.

title: Volcano Erupts In Indonesia Spewing Ash 10 Km High, 9 Killed
content: Indonesia's Mount Lewotobi Laki-laki erupted several times on Friday, belching volcanic ash that rose up to 10 km (32,800 ft) into the sky, officials said, following a big eruption on Sunday night that killed nine people.
summary: Indonesia's Mount Lewotobi Laki-laki erupted several times on Friday, belching volcanic ash that rose up to 10 km (32,800 ft) into the sky, officials said, following a big eruption on Sunday night that killed nine people.

title: Trump's Election Win Expected To Make Way For Musk's Mars Plans: Report
content: Elon Musk's dream of transporting humans to Mars will become a bigger national priority under the administration of US President-elect Donald Trump, sources said, signaling big changes for NASA's moon program and a boost for Musk's SpaceX.
summary: Elon Musk's dream of transporting humans to Mars will become a bigger national priority under the administration of US President-elect Donald Trump, sources said, signaling big changes for NASA's moon program and a boost for Musk's SpaceX.

title: Poland Links Explosive Parcels In Europe To Russian Intelligence Plot
content: Russian intelligence services were likely behind a series of parcels that exploded in courier depots across Europe, Polish prosecutors said on Friday, pointing the finger at Moscow in a case officials say could have caused an air disaster.
summary: Russian intelligence services were likely behind a series of parcels that exploded in courier depots across Europe, Polish prosecutors said on Friday, pointing the finger at Moscow in a case officials say could have caused an air disaster.

title: "Fake": Centre Rubbishes 'Secret Memo' On Indian Diplomats
content: External Affairs Ministry on Friday termed as fake a 'secretly issued memo' that has surfaced on social media and that falsely attempts to link Indian diplomats abroad with violent crimes.
summary: External Affairs Ministry on Friday termed as fake a 'secretly issued memo' that has surfaced on social media and that falsely attempts to link Indian diplomats abroad with violent crimes.

title: "Hardest Year In My Life": Prince William On 2 Cancer Diagnosis In Family
content: Prince William has described the past year in which his wife Catherine and his father, Britain's head of state King Charles III, each battled cancer as "brutal" and probably the "hardest" of his life.
summary: Prince William has described the past year in which his wife Catherine and his father, Britain's head of state King Charles III, each battled cancer as "brutal" and probably the "hardest" of his life.

title: Pakistan Bans Entry To Public Spaces, Including Parks As Pollution Worsens
content: Pakistan's Punjab banned entry to many public spaces from Friday, including parks and zoos, as it sought to protect people from severe air pollution in parts of the eastern province.
summary: Pakistan's Punjab banned entry to many public spaces from Friday, including parks and zoos, as it sought to protect people from severe air pollution in parts of the eastern province.

title: Opinion: With Trump, Taliban Gets A Familiar Face In Washington
content: While Trump's gaze is not expected to land in this part of geography anytime soon-including on Bagram-his presidency will be a test for the Taliban's political and diplomatic acumen.
summary: While Trump's gaze is not expected to land in this part of geography anytime soon-including on Bagram-his presidency will be a test for the Taliban's political and diplomatic acumen.

title: Paris Notre Dame's Bells Rings Again For First Time Since 2019 Fire
content: The bells of Notre Dame in Paris rang out together on Friday for the first time since a 2019 fire that devastated the historic cathedral, AFP reporters said.
summary: The bells of Notre Dame in Paris rang out together on Friday for the first time since a 2019 fire that devastated the historic cathedral, AFP reporters said.

title: Israeli Soccer Fans Attacked In Amsterdam, Netanyahu Sends Rescue Planes
content: Israel PM Benjamin Netanyahu has ordered the dispatch of two planes to Amsterdam to evacuate Israeli soccer fans who were attacked by an alleged Pro-Palestinian mob on Thursday night.
summary: Israel PM Benjamin Netanyahu has ordered the dispatch of two planes to Amsterdam to evacuate Israeli soccer fans who were attacked by an alleged Pro-Palestinian mob on Thursday night.

title: Notre Dame's Historic Comeback: 5 Key Moments Before Its Reopening
content: As the mighty Notre Dame cathedral prepares to reopen its doors in a month's time after a devastating fire in 2019, a look back at five key dates in the Paris landmark's colourful history.
summary: As the mighty Notre Dame cathedral prepares to reopen its doors in a month's time after a devastating fire in 2019, a look back at five key dates in the Paris landmark's colourful history.

title: 70% Of Fatalities In Gaza War Women And Children, Says UN Office
content: The UN Human Rights Office said on Friday nearly 70% of the fatalities it has verified in the Gaza war were women and children, and condemned what it called a systematic violation of the fundamental principles of international humanitarian law.
summary: The UN Human Rights Office said on Friday nearly 70% of the fatalities it has verified in the Gaza war were women and children, and condemned what it called a systematic violation of the fundamental principles of international humanitarian law.

title: India Deserves To Be In List Of Global Superpowers: Vladimir Putin
content: India deserves to be included in the list of global superpowers as its economy is currently growing faster than in any other country, Russian President Vladimir Putin has said.
summary: India deserves to be included in the list of global superpowers as its economy is currently growing faster than in any other country, Russian President Vladimir Putin has said.

title: China Prepares For Trump's Return, Focuses On Ties And Stability
content: After Donald Trump first entered the White House eight years ago, rattled Chinese leaders responded to his tariffs and fiery rhetoric with force, resulting in a trade war that plunged ties between the globe's largest economies to multiyear lows.
summary: After Donald Trump first entered the White House eight years ago, rattled Chinese leaders responded to his tariffs and fiery rhetoric with force, resulting in a trade war that plunged ties between the globe's largest economies to multiyear lows.

title: From 1800s To COP29: Highlights Of UN Climate Talks Over The Years
content: This year's UN climate conference in Baku, Azerbaijan, marks the world's 29th leadership gathering to confront global warming since the first "Conference of the Parties" in 1995.
summary: This year's UN climate conference in Baku, Azerbaijan, marks the world's 29th leadership gathering to confront global warming since the first "Conference of the Parties" in 1995.

title: "Did Entire World A Favour": Minister On Why India Buys Russian Oil
content: Union Petroleum and Natural Gas minister Hardeep Singh Puri said oil will remain a key part of the world's energy supply for years to come.
summary: Union Petroleum and Natural Gas minister Hardeep Singh Puri said oil will remain a key part of the world's energy supply for years to come.
